name: Idle Rap Tycoon: Hiphop Game
description:
The Best Gangstar Rap Simulation Game for Free!
Become the greatest rapper tycoon in this hiphop life simulation game! Discover new studios, grow your empire, manage your gang, get idle money from it. Enjoy this idle rap game, which you can be in a war with other gangs !

Have you ever dreamed of being a gangster rap boss with phone? To record songs, improve the studio, record songs and albums, freestyle, feel hiphop, make feats with famous rappers, make beatbox or free autotune.

Play this gangster mafia game and build your rap empire! Idle Rapper Tycoon is not an ordinary idle game; it’s an amazing real-world life simulator where there is mafia wars, guns, rifles, cars, concerts and other exciting things... Help you build your own gangsta city!

The future of the city is in your hands! Make the right choices and defeat your opponents with new concerts, albums, diss, wars !

Start with small city building , move to more qualified buildings, castles, upgrade your buildings and items, and become a mafia king ! .


Play this game and feel a real rapper life. Earn money, get richer, buy guns, build your gang and become the world's best singer in the process...

Game Features:
-Gangster rapper simulator
- Casual and easy gameplay
- Fight to be tycoon of rap city !
- Earn moneys and diamonds. Upgrade even when you’re offline or online!
- Free studio for single, album or diss-track !
- Funny DJ musics

If you like idle mafia games, you will enjoy this simulator! You can now enjoy all the adventures of a good rap simulation game.

This hiphop game is one of the best idle clicker games with buildings and improvements, which means you will have fun while playing it .

Idle Rapper Tycoon stands out among other simulation games thanks to its rich graphics - great fun for all builder game fans.

Build your own city and create thefts, crimes, gang wars, concerts, musical events ! And become a billionaire tycoon !
